commit message:
ItemsContentProvider: Upload even when not logged in.

Because, like the web site, we remind the user to log in or register
after a few classifications.

QuestionFragment:ClassificationInProgress: Fix unparcelling.

Use the correct class loader. Otherwise we get an exception when
Android sometimes tries to use this.

Add the mapping.txt file so it can help unobfuscate stack traces.

See
http://developer.android.com/tools/help/proguard.html#considerations
'Save the mapping.txt file for every release that you publish to your users'

IconsCache: Avoid NullPointerExceptions from LruCache.

This happend at least once, when BitmapFactory.decodeFile() failed.
Maybe we need to detect when a file has not been fully cached.
